name: Goodmood
tagline: National Geographics Photo Of The Day Desktop background for Windows
body:
### Welcome to GoodMood.

Goodmood change you desktop background with the "Photo of the day" picture taken from the [National Geographics WebSite]

Its focus is beaty and simplicity

![Goodmood Application](screenshots/goodmood.png)

### Authors and Contributors
Main author Andrea Del Signore (@sejerpz)

### Support or Contact
To report a problem or a feature request [click here](https://github.com/sejerpz/GoodMood/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
